title: New: Dam Mantle – We EP
content:
Almost a month to the day, Dam Mantle’s single ‘Not a Word’ was our single of the week. It had one of those hooks that had a consuming way of staying with you, the message still ingrained long after the final beat. The EP it was taken from, We, has just gone up for stream. At a base level it’s a dubstep album, beneath, Mantle’s confident ability to manipulate human cries gives it an uncomfortable human element, that brings with it sadness and longing.

Stream the full EP over at One Thirty BPM.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d24
